name: Painter Texture Library
summary: A TEXTURELIBRARY file contains a set of textures used in Corel Painter, a digital painting application. Artists use the textures that TEXTURELIBRARY files contain to modify their brushes and apply textures to their paintings. Saving a set of textures as a TEXTURELIBRARY file allows artists to import and use those textures in other projects.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
